creator: pkr@netnord.dk
text:
The Expand task does not log a message when the file is expands. I suggest
adding the following line:

RCS file:
/home/cvspublic/jakarta-ant/src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/Expand.java,v
retrieving revision 1.23
diff -w -c -r1.23 Expand.java
*** src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/Expand.java  10 Jan 2002 13:59:31
-0000      1.23
--- src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/Expand.java  20 Feb 2002 13:08:50 -0000
***************
*** 137,142 ****
--- 137,143 ----
       * This method is to be overridden by extending unarchival tasks.
       */
      protected void expandFile(FileUtils fileUtils, File srcF, File dir) {
+         log("Expanding: " + srcF + " into " + dir, Project.MSG_INFO);
          ZipInputStream zis = null;
          try {
              // code from WarExpand

seems a good idea. What Would the ant-dev team prefer a debug or an info level 
of information?

ps, peter: we prefer diffs as 'diff -u' attachments in their own files; it 
makes it much easier to apply
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: <untar> uses INFO, let's be consistent here.
